page.title: 18JUNIOR PLAYGROUND GAMES.
page.content: { Sticky Toffee }is a game like hit The person who is hit has to say a rhyme. Afterwards everybody runs away and if the person touches them they must stand with their legs apart until somebody frees them.If not,they're hit Some people play{Kiss Chase.}The girls chase the boys. If caught, they are kissed unwillingly. { Forty-forty} is like hide and seek, but when the person looks for you, you can 'save' yourself. { Un Deux Trois }is French.One person stands in front of the rest and says, "Un Deux Trois",and everyone does a handstand.The last one to land back on the ground wins and takes the lead. { May I?}has one person 20 paces away from the others,giving istructions to move.They must say "May I?"or they're out.We also play {"White line Chase", using the Netball court. Hea.
